data.zelda: The player can't move through walls, Monsters can't move through walls, Press "Space" to swing the sword, If a monster gets hit by the sword - it dies, If the player collides with a monster - you lose, If the player collides with the key - they pick up the key, If the player has the key and collides with the door - you win, The player can't go through the door without the key
data.realportals: If the player collides with a potion - the potion is pushed back, If the potion collides with a portal entrance - they are teleported to the portal exit, If potions collide with water - they transform into ground, Potions can't move through potions, If the player collides with a portal entrance - they are teleported to the portal exit, Missiles create Portal Entrances and Exits, The player can't go through the portal exit, If the player collides with a wand - they change form, Press "Space" to spawn a portal missile, If the player collides with the key - they pick up the key, If the player collides with the door and they have the key - the player goes through the door, The player can't go through the door without the key, If the player collides with the arch - you win
data.plants: If an enemy collides with the villager - you lose, Press "Space" to use the shovel, If the shovel is used on the dirt - the dirt becomes a plant, Plants periodically spawn pellets, If a pellet hits a zombie - both are destroyed, Enemies periodically spawn axes, If an axe collides with a plant - both are destroyed, If you surive for 1000 ticks - you win, The player can't move through walls, Enemies can't move through walls, The pellets can't go through gravestones
data.solarfox: If the player collides with a diamond - the diamond is collected, If are no more diamonds - you win, If the player collides with an enemy - you lose, Enemies spawn flames, If the player collides with a flame - you lose, If the player collides with a wall - you lose
